structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.catch_line: Water company may condemn land and material.
law.text: Any person constructing, maintaining or operating waterworks or pipelines for the supply of water to a municipality may condemn lands and materials necessary to carry out those purposes, in the manner prescribed in the Eminent Domain Act of Kentucky.
law.history: Amended 1976 Ky. Acts ch. 140, sec. 43. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4814d-1.
